languageKey.label: Add the Typoscript identifier. Only needed if you continue all configuration with Typoscript.
If you use the Typoscript configuration all settings below this field are NOT USED!
Enter the rate and discounts for one adult. See details for syntax.

The idea is: you have a default rate and you give discount after a given time (days). The fields are comma separated. The values are separated by colon. Example: 47,D:3:10% - default rate is 47 - 10% discount after 3 days on the default rate Example: 47,D:2:45,D:4:40 - default rate is 47 - after 2 days the rate is 45 - after 4 days the rate is 40 Example: 47,D:2:45,D:4:40,D:7:20% - default rate is 47 - after 2 days the rate is 45 - after 4 days the rate is 40 - after 7 days the rate is (47 - 20%) = 37,60 Example: 47,D:1:50,D:3:10% - default rate is 47 - the first night is 50 - after 2 days the rate is 47 (default) - after 3 days the rate is (47 - 10%) = 42,30
Enter the rate and discounts for two adult. See details of One Adult for syntax.
Enter the rate and discounts for three adult. See details of One Adult for syntax.
Enter the rate and discounts for four adult. See details of One Adult for syntax.
Enter the supplement for every further adult. See details of One Adult for syntax.

Enter price for extra component. E.g. Breakfast or visitor tax. This is caluclated per person.
If you don't use the discount feature in the Adult price, you may set a percentage here.
If you don't use the discount feature in the Adult price, you may set a period after the given percentage is applied.
Enter price for a single component like room cleaning. This is added only once for the stay.

Example: 10,D:2:-1 - room cleaning is 10 for 1 night - room cleaning is free as of 2 nights You may overwrite the language labels via ts: plugin.tx_abbooking_pi1 { _LOCAL_LANG { de { discount = Rabatt extraComponent1 = Frühstück extraComponent2 = Kurtaxe adultX = Weitere Person(en) specialComponent1 = Endreinigungspauschale specialComponent2 = Endreinigungspauschale } en { discount = Discount extraComponent1 = Breakfast extraComponent2 = Vistor's Tax adultX = More Person(s) specialComponent1 = Room Cleaning specialComponent2 = Room Cleaning } } }
See Single Component 1 for a detailed description.
Set a minimum stay.
Example: 3,W:8:2,W:1:1 - the default minimum stay is 3 nights - 8 weeks before start date the minimum stay is 2 nights - 1 week before start date the minimum stay is 1 night
Mark given amount of days as booked with every booking. E.g. for longer cleaning periods.
Interval of days the customer may book. E.g. set it to 7 to allow only week bookings. Set Minimumstay above to 7 too, to have the proper base.
Allowed weekdays (0-6, comma separated) for checkin for this rate. * is default.
Example: 6,0 - checkin is only possible on Saturdays and Sundays Example: * - checkin is possible all weekdays (default)
